connections.groupAffiliation: Green Lantern Corps, Justice League of America, Justice League Europe, frequently teamed with the second Flash and the original Green Arrow
connections.relatives: Martin H. "Marty" Jordan (father, deceased), Jessica Jordan (mother, deceased), Jim Jordan (younger brother), Jack Jordan (older brother, deceased), Jan Jordan (sister-in-law, deceased), Helen Jordan (neice), Larry Jordan (Air Wave I - cousin, deceased), Hal Jordan (Air Wave II - cousin)
